Description: Paul Reed Smith Custom 24 10 Top in Flame Charcoal Purple Burst. Charcoal with light purple coming through – a gorgeous 10 Top. Pattern is Thin Neck. This guitar has less than 1 hour of playing time on it, and is in excellent, like new condition. I bought it new at the end of 2017 from a music store – guitar was from remaining 2016 inventory. Includes PRS hard shell case, whammy bar (never used) and all original paperwork, guitar set-up tools and case items. 3 sets of new PRS strings included as well. See all pictures - this is a gorgeous guitar!Some background on the guitar from PRS:The Custom 24 is the quintessential PRS guitar. This iconic instrument was the first model that Paul Reed Smith brought to the public at PRS Guitars’ first Winter NAMM show in 1985 and has been a top seller ever since. Played by internationally touring artists, gigging musicians, and aspiring players, the Custom 24 features PRS’s patented Gen III tremolo system and PRS 85/15 pickups with volume and tone controls and a 5-way blade switch. 85/15 pickups were personally designed by Paul Reed Smith to offer remarkable clarity and extended high and low end.The Custom 24 is the original PRS. Since its introduction, it has offered a unique tonal option for serious players and defined PRS tone and playability.Pickup Switching Positions:Position One: Bridge humbuckerPosition Two: Bridge humbucker with neck singlecoil, in parallelPosition Three: Bridge and neck humbuckersPosition Four: Neck singlecoil with bridge singlecoil, in parallelPosition Five: Neck humbucker Specifications:25" Scale Length24 FretsEbony FretboardBird Inlays Nickel Hardware PRS Tremolo Bridge PRS Phase III Locking Tuners 85/15 PRS Pickups 5 Way Pickup Selector Blade Switch Master Volume & Tone Controls PRS Tolex Hardshell Case Paypal Only - Thanks for looking!
Title: 2016 Paul Reed Smith PRS Custom 24 10 Top Flame - Charcoal Purple Burst  w/Case
